summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.5°C) and outside temperature (down 4.9°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 728 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 8329 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1675 m), and light levels (up 10180 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 728.5m lower than yesterday, 650.7m lower than the past week, 1675.4m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 1059m to a maximum of 3380m, averaging 995.8m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1646.5m and 2670m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Drizzle or light rain possible, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
